meanings.sent1: She routinised her morning exercise by doing the same stretches every day.
meanings.sent2: He routinised his work schedule to ensure he completed tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The cat routinised its daily nap time to always coincide with the sunniest spot in the house.
meanings.sent4: The teacher routinised her classroom management to run like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: By routinising his study habits, he was able to improve his grades significantly.

meanings.definition: To establish or standardize a routine.
meanings.sent1: The company routinised its safety procedures to ensure consistency across all branches.
meanings.sent2: She routinised her skincare routine to maintain healthy skin.
meanings.sent3: The robot routinised its daily tasks, never deviating from its programmed schedule.
meanings.sent4: The bakery routinised its bread-making process to guarantee quality and efficiency.
meanings.sent5: By routinising his daily exercise, he was able to improve his fitness level over time.
